about.pageDescription: Everything about Trendy Trades online store
about.name: Trendy Trades
about.title: About Us
about.subTitle: Trendy Trades online store
about.aboutDescription: The development of the Internet has completely changed our shopping methods. The benefits of online shopping are encouraging more and more people to experience it every day and change their usual shopping patterns. After some time, online shopping has become more synchronized with the speed of modern life and has been able to align itself with the moods and growing needs of customers. While the daily busyness has reduced the opportunity to enjoy leisure time, spending long periods of time to make inner-city trips and buy daily needs loses its meaning. What is prioritized for people in their free time is recreation, education, sports, enjoying personal interests and relieving daily fatigue.

privacy.pageDescription: Privacy Policy of Trendy Trades online store
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: At Trendy Trades, your privacy is our priority. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our online shop or purchase our products.

descriptions.first: When you interact with our website, we may collect the following types of information:
descriptions.second: We use your information for the following purposes:
descriptions.third: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to others. However, we may share your information with trusted third parties, including:
descriptions.forth: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies help us remember your preferences and track your interaction with our website.
descriptions.fifth: We implement advanced security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. Our website uses secure SSL encryption to safeguard your data during transactions.
descriptions.sixth: As a user, you have the following rights:
descriptions.seventh: Our website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these sites and encourage you to review their policies.
descriptions.eighth: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with the updated effective date.
descriptions.ninth: For any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

first.title: Personal Information:
first.text: Name, email address, phone number, shipping address, and payment details (processed securely through our payment providers).

second.title: Non-Personal Information:
second.text: Browser type, device type, IP address, and browsing behavior on our site to improve your shopping experience.

first.title: Order Processing:
first.text: To fulfill and deliver your orders, provide invoices, and handle returns or exchanges.

second.title: Customer Support:
second.text: To respond to your inquiries and provide assistance.

third.title: Marketing:
third.text: To send promotional offers, updates, and newsletters if you have opted in.

forth.title: Website Improvements:
forth.text: To analyze trends and improve our website functionality and services.

second.title: Shipping Partners:
second.text: To deliver your orders to your doorstep.

third.title: Legal Authorities:
third.text: If required by law or to protect our legal rights.

forthListItems.first: You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings, but please note this may affect the functionality of our site.

first.title: Access:
first.text: Request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.

second.title: Correction:
second.text: Update or correct your personal details.

third.title: Deletion:
third.text: Request the deletion of your personal data, subject to legal or contractual obligations.

forth.title: Marketing Preferences:
forth.text: Opt out of receiving promotional communications by contacting us or using the unsubscribe link in our emails.

terms.pageDescription: Terms & Conditions of Trendy Trades online store
terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.description: Welcome to Trendy Trades! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Trendy Trades' website, based in Dubai, United Arab Emirates..
terms.secondDescription: By accessing or using this website, you agree to these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must discontinue use of our website.

descriptions.first: Trendy Trades operates as an online retail shop selling original clothes, shoes, and bags. All prices are listed in AED (United Arab Emirates Dirham) unless otherwise stated. We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Changes will be updated on this page.
descriptions.second: Orders can be placed directly through our website. Ensure all information provided is accurate and complete. Payment methods include credit/debit cards, digital wallets, or any other options available during checkout. Orders will be confirmed via email once payment has been processed.
descriptions.third: We ship across the UAE. Delivery times and charges will vary based on your location and selected delivery method. Estimated delivery times are provided at checkout but may vary due to external factors beyond our control. Customers are responsible for providing a correct and complete delivery address.
descriptions.forth: Products can be returned or exchanged within 14 days of purchase, provided they are unused, in their original packaging, and with all tags attached. Refunds will be processed in the original payment method within 7–10 business days after receiving the returned item. Items on sale or promotion may not be eligible for return or exchange unless stated otherwise.
descriptions.fifth: Trendy Trades guarantees that all products sold on our website are 100% authentic and sourced from authorized suppliers. Product images are for illustrative purposes only; colors and details may vary slightly.
descriptions.sixth: Users must not use our website for any unlawful or unauthorized purpose. Any attempt to interfere with the website’s functionality or compromise security is strictly prohibited.
descriptions.seventh: All personal data collected through our website is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy. We take measures to protect your data and ensure secure transactions.
descriptions.eighth: Trendy Trades shall not be held responsible for any indirect or consequential losses arising from the use of our website or products. Our liability is limited to the value of the purchased product in question.
descriptions.ninth: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United Arab Emirates. Any disputes arising from the use of our website will be resolved in the Dubai courts.
descriptions.tenth: For any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

refund.pageDescription: Refund conditions of Trendy Trades online store
refund.title: Refund Policy
refund.description: At Trendy Trades, we strive to ensure customer satisfaction with every purchase. Please read our refund policy carefully to understand how returns and refunds are handled based on your location and order conditions.
refund.contactDescription: For any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at:

titles.first: Refund and Exchange for UAE Customers

firstListItems.first: If you are located within the United Arab Emirates, you may return or exchange items within the specified timeframe, provided that the product is unused, in its original packaging, and with all tags attached.
firstListItems.second: If your ordered item is out of stock, we will contact you via WhatsApp to offer an alternative or process a cancellation with a full refund.

secondListItems.first: Customers outside the UAE are not eligible for returns or exchanges.
secondListItems.second: If an ordered item is unavailable, we will contact you via WhatsApp or email to discuss the cancellation of your order and arrange a full refund.

thirdListItems.first: Refunds will be processed using the original payment method within 7–10 business days.
thirdListItems.second: Shipping fees are non-refundable unless the issue was due to an error on our part.
